ygData.subject: Re: Lifetap anything for SK
ygData.msgSnippet: As nice as that would be, I don t think it is really necessary. I assume of course that everyone keeps their bind wound up to scratch to half the downtime.
ygData.messageBody:
As nice as that would be, I don't think it is really necessary. I assume of course that everyone keeps their bind wound up to
scratch to half the downtime. then it is just half your health. A nice portion of which would heal up while medding. In a
pinch you could hunt low level greens with vampiric embrace on.

Inos
Veeshan
